mapper.select: select boardNo, title, writer, content, memberNo, timePosted, hit from(select boardNo, title, writer, content, memberNo, timePosted, hit, CEIL(rownum/5) AS page from(select board_no as boardNo, title, writer, content, member_no as memberNo, time_posted as timePosted, hit from board where board_type='auction' order by boardNo desc)) where page=#{value}
select count(*) from board where board_type='auction'
select board_no, title, writer, content, member_no, time_posted, hit from board where board_no=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into YMV_COMMENT(comment_no, writer, content, time_posted, board_no) values(ymv_seq.nextval,#{writer},#{content},sysdate,#{boardNo})
mapper.select: select comment_no, writer, content, time_posted, board_no from YMV_COMMENT where board_no=#{value}
select * from ymv_comment where board_no=#{boardNo} order by comment_no desc
mapper.delete: delete from ymv_comment where board_no=#{boardNo} and comment_no=#{commentNo}
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where board_no=#{boardNo}
